name: Decay in Crevice
description:
Most parts of the home planet have been submerged. Its people started to live in different moons and planets, but stale crops and artificial livestock, everything will never be as good as their home planet. And when they have found a reachable planet, they think they can live in, what are they going to do?

Short space opera visual novel created by Team Celephaïs in 3 days for BGDJam 2022. Two endings in slightly over 4000 words in total.

Credits:

Writing, programming, art, GUI: usarin

Photographs:  Alexandra Diaconu, Stevan Kunze, Rosan Harmens, Ryan Lum
Music: Fushigi Works, Roharuma Fuyuhi
Sound effects: Waraya Takashi, Causality Sounds, Berlin Atmospheres
Ren'Py GUI template guide: BáiYù
